content:
Craft an item of type: red_wool
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 58, "index": 15}, {"type": "turtle_spawn_egg", "quantity": 57, "index": 17}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 54, "index": 20}, {"type": "carrot_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 27, "index": 26}, {"type": "chiseled_polished_blackstone", "quantity": 19, "index": 29}, {"type": "grass", "quantity": 8, "index": 32}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 33, "index": 42}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 4, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft red_wool, I first need to craft white_wool. White_wool requires placing 4 string side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the string from slot 43 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: red_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 58, "index": 15}, {"type": "turtle_spawn_egg", "quantity": 57, "index": 17}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 54, "index": 20}, {"type": "carrot_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 27, "index": 26}, {"type": "chiseled_polished_blackstone", "quantity": 19, "index": 29}, {"type": "grass", "quantity": 8, "index": 32}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 33, "index": 42}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 3, "index": 43}]

thought: Now that one string has been moved into the crafting grid, I need to place another string to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the string to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 2 with quantity 1

thought: Now that two strings have been moved into the crafting grid, I need to place another string below them. Slot 4 is below slot 1, and therefore I will move the string to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: red_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 58, "index": 15}, {"type": "turtle_spawn_egg", "quantity": 57, "index": 17}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 54, "index": 20}, {"type": "carrot_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 27, "index": 26}, {"type": "chiseled_polished_blackstone", "quantity": 19, "index": 29}, {"type": "grass", "quantity": 8, "index": 32}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 33, "index": 42}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]

thought: Now that three strings have been moved into the crafting grid, I need to place the last string to the right of the third string. Slot 5 is to the right of slot 4, and therefore I will move the string to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 5 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: red_wool
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 58, "index": 15}, {"type": "turtle_spawn_egg", "quantity": 57, "index": 17}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 54, "index": 20}, {"type": "carrot_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 27, "index": 26}, {"type": "chiseled_polished_blackstone", "quantity": 19, "index": 29}, {"type": "grass", "quantity": 8, "index": 32}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 33, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I can craft the white_wool by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: red_wool
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 58, "index": 15}, {"type": "turtle_spawn_egg", "quantity": 57, "index": 17}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 54, "index": 20}, {"type": "carrot_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 27, "index": 26}, {"type": "chiseled_polished_blackstone", "quantity": 19, "index": 29}, {"type": "grass", "quantity": 8, "index": 32}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 33, "index": 42}]

thought: To craft a red_wool, I need to dye a white_wool with a red_dye. I have some rose_bush at slot 25 which I can use to craft red_dye. Therefore, I will first move the rose_bush into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: red_wool
inventory=[{"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 58, "index": 15}, {"type": "turtle_spawn_egg", "quantity": 57, "index": 17}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 54, "index": 20}, {"type": "carrot_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 27, "index": 26}, {"type": "chiseled_polished_blackstone", "quantity": 19, "index": 29}, {"type": "grass", "quantity": 8, "index": 32}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 33, "index": 42}]
thought: The rose_bush has been crafted into red_dye, so I will move it into my inventory. I have chosen slot 12 because it is the first free slot after the white_wool.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 2

Craft an item of type: red_wool
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 58, "index": 15}, {"type": "turtle_spawn_egg", "quantity": 57, "index": 17}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 54, "index": 20}, {"type": "carrot_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 27, "index": 26}, {"type": "chiseled_polished_blackstone", "quantity": 19, "index": 29}, {"type": "grass", "quantity": 8, "index": 32}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 33, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft red_wool, I need to place 1 red_dye and 1 white_wool side by side in the crafting grid. Therefore I will first need to move the white_wool from slot 11 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 2 with quantity 1
